analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
translated: and having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, they know this perfection of wisdom, the field of activity of the tathÄgatas, the worthy ones, the perfectly complete buddhas who have understood all characteristics.

original: mo 'di ngo mtshar lags so //
analyzed: mo 'di ngo mtshar lags so //
translated: This is amazing!

original: chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa dang / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa dang / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa dang /
translated: â€œUnderstanding the characteristics of all phenomena is understanding the characteristics of form, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness, and similarly understanding the characteristics of the perfection of giving,

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus @192a *//
translated: the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance,

analyzed: ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

analyzed: lha dag / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: â€œGods, this profound perfection of wisdom has the characteristic of emptiness.

analyzed: lha dag / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //

analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
translated: Gods, likewise this profound perfection of wisdom has the characteristic of non-conditioning, the characteristic of non-production, the characteristic of non-cessation, the characteristic of non-affliction,

original: lha dag / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan nyid de lta bu yin yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi don du ming dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad kyis tha snyad du 'dogs par mdzad de; lha dag /
analyzed: lha dag / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan nyid de lta bu yin yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi don du ming dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad kyis tha snyad du 'dogs par mdzad de; lha dag /
translated: â€œGods, this profound perfection of wisdom has such characteristics, and yet the TathÄgata, for the sake of the world, has designated it with names, symbols, designations, and conventional expressions.

original: de dag don dam par ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag don dam par ni ma yin te /

analyzed: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dkrug par mi nus so //
translated: The world with its gods, humans, and asuras cannot disturb it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin du mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes / mtshan nyid kyis @192b mtshan nyid med pa'ang rab tu mi shes /

analyzed: mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes /

analyzed: mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid med pa'ang rab tu mi shes te /
translated: And because of the absence of characteristics, the absence of characteristics is not known.

original: lha dag / de ltar na mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / de dag gnyis ka gang gis shes par 'gyur ba dang / gang shes par 'gyur ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lha dag / de ltar na mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / de dag gnyis ka gang gis shes par 'gyur ba dang / gang shes par 'gyur ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Gods, it is impossible for the characteristics, the absence of characteristics, the characteristics of the characteristics, and that by which they are both known and that which is to be known to exist.

analyzed: lha dag / mtshan nyid de dag ni gzugs kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin /

translated: The applications of mindfulness,

analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /

analyzed: gang la la zhig 'di @193a *// kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa nas /

analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One replied to the gods of the desire and form realms:

analyzed: lha dag / gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni gzugs su rung ba ste /
translated: â€œGods, the defining characteristic of form is that it can be formed.ğŸ”½The Thus-Gone One has fully and perfectly awakened to it as having no defining characteristic.

analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: The TathÄgata has fully and perfectly awakened to the absence of characteristics of all those.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
